channel.title: Behind the scenes august; what do you think?
channel.description:
http://services.runescape.com/m=news/behind-the-scenes---august-5
Well the mini jad sounds pretty cool :) and the requirements seem fair, though 99 slayer? I guess because all the other monster pets are obtained via summoning, and since hes the strongest, he is @ 99. Minigame updates! :D Runecrafting robes with a boost. Hybrid armour lvl 85? Im gettin it :D Eh, but nothing cw related D:

item.title: Behind the scenes august; what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @Mod_L Mod L
item.description:
@Mod_L wrote:

sexy new edge. need 6 slayer levels for pet jad :3 but im not getting him,i enjoy my metal dragon tasks ;3

Read full topic

[/quote]

Mine’s 85.[/quote]
87, 103k until 88

item.title: Behind the scenes august; what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @SETO SETO
item.description:
@SETO wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:19, topic:408227”][quote author=87th Element link=topic=509510.msg3697265#msg3697265 date=1312511060]

They released images of the new areas in their Media section on their site.
New GE: http://i.imgur.com/SwLeI.jpg
New Edgeville: http://i.imgur.com/9pMnE.jpg

nothing stopping bots, therefore I do not give a fuck

Lol you sound like a typical user from the RS forums. They are trying to deal with the bots via law suits (They recently took Nexus to court again didn’t they?) instead of just banning the endless amount of them. Take away the source of them, instead of banning them just for another to pop up. Seems more logical to me.
[/quote]Im not liking the new g.e, seems like its a jungle now but yet its in varrock

Before the GE was there, all that was there was trees, so it wouldn’t be a complete idiot’s move, they had trees there at one point, and it seems they want some trees back.[/quote]
the trees were cut down for the new GE…save the trees…varrock has become a metropolitan

Read full topic
item.source: Behind the scenes august; what do you think?

nothing stopping bots, therefore I do not give a fuck

Lol you sound like a typical user from the RS forums. They are trying to deal with the bots via law suits (They recently took Nexus to court again didn’t they?) instead of just banning the endless amount of them. Take away the source of them, instead of banning them just for another to pop up. Seems more logical to me.
[/quote]Im not liking the new g.e, seems like its a jungle now but yet its in varrock[/quote]

Before the GE was there, all that was there was trees, so it wouldn’t be a complete idiot’s move, they had trees there at one point, and it seems they want some trees back.

item.title: Behind the scenes august; what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:14, topic:408227”][quote author=SacredHeart link=topic=509510.msg3696853#msg3696853 date=1312490732]
A pet Jad would be good, if it hit as high as the Real Jad.
[/quote]
Its a pet. Pets don’t attack. Unless he’s special lol

Tbh not surprised, i mean near reality always uses customs. Either way, tables have turned; rs has been leeching US for some time…

Us? Its their client… Most of everything is THEIR ideas.[/quote]
@Elve and rich
I meant ideas, or something similar… i cant name a specific one, but i know there have been quite a few of these occurring.

Read full topic

item.title: Behind the scenes august; what do you think?
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Mitko:

99 slay and summoning are alright but a fire cape would be tough for some i think. Like me.

The fire cape is the easiest thing to get of those requirements, it doesn’t require high stats or good equipment to complete the fight caves.

drubrkletern:

Tbh not surprised, i mean near reality always uses customs. Either way, tables have turned; rs has been leeching US for some time…

This is what retards actually believe.

@rip4d wrote:
